sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Gestão de Usuário">186971c51b5e1810776c0e9fe54bcbdd</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0c4ab1c91b5e1810776c0e9fe54bcb31</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>03_Operação_old</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	g_form.setDisplay('user_management',true);
	g_form.setReadOnly('user_management',true);
	
	if(g_form.getValue('opera_o') == 'Criar'){
		g_form.setDisplay('criar',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('user_id',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('email',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('nome',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('user_roles',true);		
	}
	
	if(g_form.getValue('opera_o') == 'Alterar'){
		g_form.setDisplay('alterar',true);
		//g_form.setReadOnly('user_name',true);
	}
	
	if(g_form.getValue('opera_o') == 'Deletar'){
		g_form.setDisplay('deletar',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('deletar',true);
	}  
	
	if(g_form.getValue('opera_o') == 'Ativar'){
		g_form.setDisplay('ativar_cs',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('ativar_cs',true);
	} 
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>leandro.monteiro@tivit.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-07 16:08:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cfa33e641be61050f47667853a4bcb72</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>03_Operação_old</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="User Management" source="x_tivit_user_manag">704931851b5e1810776c0e9fe54bcbde</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="User Management">704931851b5e1810776c0e9fe54bcbde</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cfa33e641be61050f47667853a4bcb72</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>leandro.monteiro@tivit.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-07 16:08:38</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
